original_text: And those which pitch by him shall be the tribe of Simeon: and the captain of the children of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 시므온 지파라 시므온 자손의 지휘관은 수리삿대의 아들 슬루미엘이요

sentences.original_text: And those which pitch by him
shall be the tribe of Simeon
and the captain of the children of Simeon
shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai
